turkish_example_sentence: Biz temiz içme suyunu bulmuş olsaydık, çölde kaybolmazdık ve kurtulurduk
english_example_sentence: If we had found the clean drinking water, we would not have gotten lost in the desert and would have been saved
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы нашли чистую питьевую воду, мы бы не заблудились в пустыне и были бы спасены
